channel.title: Comments on: Episode #72: The Broader Economy

item.title: By: Cello
item.dc:creator: Cello
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/episode-72/#comment-273">!Yes?</a>.
He is the best isn't he?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to !Yes?.

He is the best isn’t he?

item.title: By: Cello
item.dc:creator: Cello
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/episode-72/#comment-271">Cynthia</a>.
You're welcome. Thank you for listening!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Cynthia.

You’re welcome. Thank you for listening!

item.title: By: artstateofmind@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: artstateofmind@gmail.com
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/episode-72/#comment-272">David Patton</a>.
I don't go into your kitchen and tell your wife how to make me a sandwich. We do what we want, pal.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to David Patton.

I don’t go into your kitchen and tell your wife how to make me a sandwich. We do what we want, pal.

item.title: By: !Yes?
item.dc:creator: !Yes?
item.description: Hey Antonopoulos, your views and opinions are always enlightening and pure! Keep on rolling, you are great!
item.content:encoded: Hey Antonopoulos, your views and opinions are always enlightening and pure! Keep on rolling, you are great!

item.title: By: David Patton
item.dc:creator: David Patton
item.description: Anyone that starts off their amateur podcast with competition profanity is a detriment to the crypto community. We're wanting to educate as many as possible in the general public, and you have determined yourself unworthy of being a credible resource. Yeah you! High five!
item.content:encoded:
Anyone that starts off their amateur podcast with competition profanity is a detriment to the crypto community.
We’re wanting to educate as many as possible in the general public, and you have determined yourself unworthy of being a credible resource.
Yeah you! High five!

item.title: By: Cynthia
item.dc:creator: Cynthia
item.description: This was a refreshing episode. The global perspective appreciated.
item.content:encoded: This was a refreshing episode. The global perspective appreciated.
